thread.title: BigRentz to Break a Guinness World Record to Raise Money for Fight Against Breast Cancer
thread.title_full: BigRentz to Break a Guinness World Record to Raise Money for Fight Against Breast Cancer - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BigRentz to Break a Guinness World Record to Raise Money for Fight Against Breast Cancer
text:
BigRentz
Construction industry leader invites public to participate in this once-in-a-lifetime event
IRVINE, Calif. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- BigRentz ( www.bigrentz.com ), the nation's leading provider of online construction equipment rentals, announced today that its team will attempt to break a Guinness World Record to raise money for Susan G. Komen Orange County.
On Saturday, October 24 , employees of BigRentz will try to break the world's record for passing a pallet between forklifts, in a perilous maneuver that takes skill, precision, and steady hands.
The " Passionately Pink Pallet Relay " features a special pink pallet that has been designed for this event, and will contain the signatures of all those who have contributed to Susan G. Komen Orange County.
This is a family-friendly event that will allow the public to witness the excitement of creating a new world record, and provide the opportunity to get involved with a worthy cause during Breast Cancer Awareness Month. One hundred percent of funds raised during the event will be donated directly to Susan G. Komen Orange County.
Susan G. Komen Orange County is a local breast health organization helping to serve women and save lives by addressing breast cancer on multiple fronts such as research, community health, global outreach and public policy.
BigRentz is a leading technology company that has been named a "Top Workplace" for two consecutive years, and a "Fastest Growing Company in Orange County " for both 2014 and 2015.
As the company continues to grow by leaps and bounds, they find new ways to give back to the community, including helping build homes with Habitat for Humanity, and participating in the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge in a most unusual way â€“ involving their heavy construction equipment.
The Passionately Pink Pallet Relay World Record Attempt Event will take place at:
1063 McGaw Ave
Irvine, CA 92614
Saturday, October 24
12 Noon
For more information, or to make an online donation, visit: http://goo.gl/T8YQZ5
About BigRentz:
BigRentz is the leader in online equipment rentals. The company offers both short- and long-term packages, and is the "One Call Does it All" source for scissor lifts, boom lifts, forklifts, backhoes, excavators, jobsite services, and other equipment to meet the needs of small or multi-location businesses, home construction, general contractors, stadiums, and municipal projects.
For more information or to speak with a Rental Expert, call (855)-999-LIFT (5438), or visit: www.BigRentz.com .
